## isString() function

Returns true if object is string, otherwise false

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isString(value: any): value is string;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

value is string
